name: StreetFight
description:
Geiger, the most evil force in the universe, controls the eight planets in the galaxy and has caused tremendous calamities to the Earth.
Destroy the Geiger on the Earth and reclaim the planet.
Fantastic magic, let you trance in the real virtual world. To fight for justice, invincible hand over the streets, hurry to reclaim once your favorite, now dominated by the forces of evil children!

　　Who gon' pray for me?

　　Take my pain for me?
　
　　Save my soul for me?
